MEETING.TITLE: Schedule a Meeting
MEETING.SUBJECT: Subject:
MEETING.TIME_IN_THE_PAST_WARN: Start time cannot be in the past.
MEETING.DELETE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete?
MEETING.TERMINAL_CONFLICT: One or more selected endpoints are busy at that time

PIN_REQUEST.TITLE_PIN_ASSIGN: Specify the one-time PIN for this meeting. Only numeric digits are allowed.

ERROR.NOT_VALID_TIME: Incorrect time or format. Time should be in format: "X:XX AM" or "XX:XX AM"
ERROR.CAPTION: An error occured
ERROR.UNKNOWN_VALIDATION_ERROR: Unknown validation error. Please contact the server administrator.
ERROR.VIRTUAL_CONFERENCE_ID_CONFLICTED: Virtual conference ID conflicted. Please choose another virtual room or schedule this meeting to another time.
ERROR.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: No response from server or server error. Try again later.
ERROR.SERVICE_INTERNAL_ERROR: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request. Please contact the server administrator.
ERROR.MISSING_REQUEST_PARAM: Request parameter is missing. Please check with your Administrator.
ERROR.VIRTUAL_ROOM_REQUIRED: Only Virtual Room is allowed when schedule a meeting
ERROR.ERROR_INVALID_P2P_INFO:
The Point to Point meeting has not been scheduled because one or more of the following requirements has not been met:
1. This call has 2 endpoints.
2. Neither of the endpoints are SIP endpoints.
ERROR.USER_ID_REQUEST_ERROR: No response from server for User ID request. Please wait a moment and try again or contact the server administrator.
ERROR.ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact the server administrator.
ERROR.MCU_RESOURCE_SHORTAGE:
Cannot schedule the meeting (Avaya Meetings Media Server capacity reached).
Check your meeting settings and try again.
ERROR.ERC_WAITING_ROOM_REQUIRED_IN_TE: Waiting Room is required in TE environment, check your meeting settings
ERROR.ERROR_DAYOFWEEKS_REQUIRED: You must specify desired days of recurring

DESCRIPTION_LINES.DAILY: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} day(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.DAILY_WITH_ENDDATE: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} day(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} until {{meetingEndDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.WEEKLY: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} week(s) on {{weeklyDaysString}} effective {{meetingDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.WEEKLY_WITH_ENDDATE: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} week(s) on {{weeklyDaysString}} effective {{meetingDateString}} until {{meetingEndDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.MONTHLY: Occurs day {{selectedMonthDay}} of every {{numberOfRepeats}} month(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.MONTHLY_WITH_ENDDATE: Occurs day {{selectedMonthDay}} of every {{numberOfRepeats}} month(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} until {{meetingEndDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.

SELECT_LOCATION.TITLE: Location
SELECT_LOCATION.SELECT_VIRTUAL_ROOM: Please, choose virtual room for meeting

ERROR.MEETING_ID_MUST_START: Must contains only numbers and starts from {{number}}

ADVANCED_OPTIONS.TITLE: Meeting Option
ADVANCED_OPTIONS.PLACE_PARTICIPANTS: Place participants in “waiting room” until the moderator joins the meeting
ADVANCED_OPTIONS.TERMINATE_TIME: Terminate at scheduled time and alert in advance (minutes):
ADVANCED_OPTIONS.TERMINATE_LEFT: Terminate after all participants left the meeting (minutes):

BROADCAST.ADD_AN_IMAGE: Add an image to help viewers identify this broadcast
BROADCAST.DESCRIPTION: Enter a description of the broadcast
BROADCAST.SHOW_PUBLIC: Show broadcast in list of public events
BROADCAST.Q_A_TOOLTIP: Enter a PIN to allow additional moderators for Q&A chat
BROADCAST.BROADCAST_UNAVAILABLE: Broadcast is not supported for recurring meetings.
